entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as stumbling to a halt outside a grimy dark door with an immense iron lock and slumped against the wall, clutching at a stitch in his chest.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's heart was beating a violent tattoo against his Adam's apple.

entities.name: the door
entities.description: The door is described as grimy and dark with an immense iron lock.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley is standing near the door.
Harry stepped inside the courtroom, implying he entered through the door.
